segments.text: Hey , let's go out and grab a couple of beers tonight !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I can't . I have to work late at the laboratory .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nigel , you sure lead a dog's life , what's up with that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My boss wants me to finish this project tonight .
segments.speaker: S2
